title: Chocolate brownie cheesecake
ingredients: ['For the base', '110g digestive biscuits', '2 chocolate brownies, chopped', '75g butter, melted', 'For the filling', '350g mascarpone cheese', '400g cream cheese', '150g chocolate, melted', '150ml double cream', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 chocolate brownies, finely chopped']
